attributes.additional_details: I want parliament to keep trans right and just let trans people be themselves. They haven’t done anything wrong, so no one should have a problem with this. I don’t want you to just consider this, I want you to do something about it!
attributes.background: Rishi Sunak is planning to take away trans rights from the equality act, making it difficult for trans people to get life saving care that they need and making it harder for them to find safe spaces. As a queer person I find this disgusting.
